title: Travis Gerke, ScD
text: As academic faculty, I led cancer-focused research teams in the application / development of tools for applied machine learning, causal inference, and biostatistics. In the post-academic setting, I direct data science efforts in cloud-based informatics and advanced analytics with a focus in oncology clinical trials.

title: Travis Gerke, ScD
text:
Education
Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health | Boston, MA Sc.D. in Epidemiology | 2014
Harvard University | Cambridge, MA A.M. in Biostatistics | 2011
University of Florida | Gainesville, FL B.A. in Mathematics | 2009 B.S. in Statistics | 2009

title: Travis Gerke, ScD
text:
Experience
The Prostate Cancer Clinical Trials Consortium (PCCTC) | New York, NY Director of Data Science | 2021 - Present
cStructure, LLC | San Diego, CA Co-founder, Chief Analytics Officer | 2023 - Present
Moffitt Cancer Center | Tampa, FL Health Informatics Director | 2020 - 2021 Scientific Director of Collaborative Data Services | 2018 - 2021 Assistant Member, Cancer Epidemiology | 2016 - 2020
Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health | Boston, MA Visiting Scientist, Department of Epidemiology | 2014-2020
University of Florida | Gainesville, FL Assistant Professor, Epidemiology | 2014 - 2016

title: Travis Gerke, ScD
text: As academic faculty, I led cancer-focused research teams in the application / development of tools for applied machine learning, causal inference, and biostatistics.
